description.value: You were born with or obtained a special connection to either fresh water or salt water. Once made, this decision can't be changed. Whenever you take your full rest in a natural body of water of the type corresponding to your connection, you recover [[/r {@actor.level}[healing]]]{additional Hit Points} equal to your level, and if you have the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Doomed]{Doomed} or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Fatigued]{Fatigued} conditions, you reduce them by 2 instead of 1.
